resNameAdd:
1) Sri Paniya Sutradhar @ Mangla
    Advocate - M.K. Wary

acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Judgment delivered.Accused Paniya Sutradhar @ Mangla is sentenced rigorous imprisonment for life U/S Section 302 I.P.C. and directed to pay fine of Rs.5,000/-. He is further sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for a period of five years for the offence under U/S 201 I.P.C. and directed him to pay fine of Rs.3,000/-. Though accused is convicted U/S 6 of POCSO Act and Section 376-AB I.P.C. but, punishment is given U/S 376-AB I.P.C. only because according to Section 42 of POCSO Act, the punishment U/S 376-AB I.P.C. is greater than that of Section 6 of POCSO Act. Therefore, convict  Paniya Sutradhar @ Mangla is sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for life which shall mean the imprisonment for the remainder of his natural life and he is further directed to pay fine of Rs.10,000/-. All the sentences will run concurrently.

Though accused is convicted U/S 6 of POCSO Act and Section 376-AB I.P.C. but, punishment is given U/S 376-AB I.P.C. only because according to Section 42 of POCSO Act, the punishment U/S 376-AB I.P.C. is greater than that of Section 6 of POCSO Act. Therefore, convict  Paniya Sutradhar @ Mangla is sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for life which shall mean the imprisonment for the remainder of his natural life and he is further directed to pay fine of Rs.10,000/-. All the sentences will run concurrently.
